website_summaries.verdict: A reliable mid-range pod coffee maker that accepts K-cups or pods.
pros: This pod coffee maker is a good Keurig alternative with a 45-ounce reservoir and the ability to use K-cups or pods
Customers love the look and feel of this machine, as well as quick heating time
Despite the reservoir size, this is a relatively compact model
cons: A few customers had issues with cleaning the machine and excess coffee grounds, but others reported no issues

customer_reviews.title: Satifactory espresso machine
customer_reviews.text: It did not work on arrival. They sent us a new one and it works well. 1 month so far and no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Mueller Nespresso - Less expensive, and a decent product.
customer_reviews.text: I liked how quickly it brewed the espresso, as well as how the water reservoir is completely clear, so one can see the water level without having to look through a sight glass. It is also nice how small and compact it is. However, I did not like how the nespresso cartridge chamber is horizontally loaded because after it is done brewing, there is either a little hot water or espresso left in the chamber, which can not be completely cleaned out.
customer_reviews.author: Cami

customer_reviews.title: LOUD! but effective
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited for this to come in, but the machine would not draw up any water out of the water tank. I called customer service and they sent me a video on how to completely deconstruct the machine to fix a wire. I was skeptical at first, but proceeded and they were right! One wire wasn't connected properly, which they said happens sometimes during shipping. This machine IS compatible with Nespresso pods, and the espresso is great! I bought a milk frother to make cappuccinos since the machine does not come with one. It is really loud when making espresso, much louder than a keurig, but it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: not working
customer_reviews.text: We spent couple hour to try it, google it to see is air bubble blocking the pump etc. still can't resolve the problem. so return it right a way.... and get the other brand which works fine.... it would be good value if it work but i can't even get 1 cup of coffee out of this machine.....
customer_reviews.author: Fruit Kingdom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful unit, doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product so much. It’s sleek and gorgeous, but that’s it. I bought a unit and it didn’t work. I got a great response from customer service and a free replacement but besides that the product still did not work. I bought 3 different espresso pod brands thinking maybe that was the issue but still the machine would not give me a drop. Hours of research and going over the manual got me nowhere. So sad because I was dying for this machine and I’m so greatly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Venice

customer_reviews.title: FIRE HAZARD!!! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: On the 4th pod the unit started smoking and began burning through the sides. If I wasn’t standing right there it would have caught fire. This is the third report of a fire hazard on Amazon for this product. It should be pulled IMMEDIATELY! Also the coffee was terrible. It was bitter and had no crema compared to a real Nespresso machine.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: This is Made in PRC  (hidden way to say China)k, and it leaks.
customer_reviews.text: This is Made in PRC (hidden way to say (People Republic of ) China) Their ad says "EUROPEAN QUALITY – AMERICAN GUARANTEE - " But is is made in China for better or worse. They seem to have gone to great length to minimize that fact. No comparison to other coffee makers. Spend more you'll be happy. PS. Several months later it is leaking water and going to the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: naro20

customer_reviews.title: Did not work. Dud machine
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping that this would be a great product because the price is very reasonable. I guess you get what you pay for in the end. I followed the instructions exactly as described and upon plugging in and turning on, I smelled a mild burning odor, like an electric coil preheating. Once i activated the button to begin the brewing process, NOTHING. No pumping noise, no movement of water through the machine, just nothing. I attempted to rectify but after 30 minutes gave up, so i returned. Unfortunate and i would highly recommend buying dome thing more dependable if you don’t wan the hassle that I went through.
customer_reviews.author: PA Banker

customer_reviews.title: Issue loading capsule...
customer_reviews.text: One critical issue when using the machine is the loading of capsule. I have experienced multiple times when the new capsule just drops through the collection bin when inserted. I have to retrieve the unused capsule and adjust the loading handle to carefully load it again. This is a quality control issue and should have been remedied prior to market.
customer_reviews.author: LoyalAmazonCust

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t work AND customer service sucks
customer_reviews.text: I just received my machine and was super excited & the darn thing was defective. No coffee or water came out of it through the coffee spout, it was leaking water from god knows where. I called customer service and explained to her what was happening & all she said was that she would email me a video to trouble shoot (which was fine by me) she said she’d email me in 10 minutes (instead of idk staying on the line to verify I got it)... long behold 15 pass by no email so I call back and I get an answering machine. Please do yourself a favor and don’t order this piece of crap
customer_reviews.author: Gisell Langelier

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive compact machine
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is great which is easy to use, it is compact and makes a great espresso either in a shot or a tall lungo. I make from 3-4 espressos a day. Once you turn on, it takes only a few minutes to heat the water. This unit has it's own water reservoir. you drop a nespresso equivalent pod in the slot, pull the handle down to pierce the pod, then press the top of the front button for a shot or the bottom of the button for a tall lungo. Once its making, you can press the button to stop at any time.
customer_reviews.author: Lar Bian

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first espresso machine I have ever purchased and I think I made the right choice. Yes it is loud but not uncommon among most espresso machines from what I gather from reading other reviews of other machines. It definitely has power and produces a great cup. Machine is small and easy to use and set up. Espresso comes out hot. It is all plastic parts on the outside but I think for the price that be be forgiven. Overall excellent machine for the price!
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Superb Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We loved this espresso machine but had an issue with it about 2 months in. First I emailed the company and let them know what was happening- our machine was suddenly producing about a 2 oz cup vs. 1 oz. we thought we might need to reset, perhaps we inadvertently changed a setting- they helped troubleshoot the issue and when it was not resolved they said the would send us a new one! They were apologetic and wanted to make sure we were satisfied- such a positive experience that I would not hesitate to purchase more as gifts. Knowing that they take pride in their products make all the difference in the world😊
customer_reviews.author: Benuska

customer_reviews.title: Machine doesn't work upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: My parents received after Christmas and followed the simple instructions, however, the machine will not function at all. We did all the troubleshooting, but still didn't work. I will have to call customer service tomorrow to let them know. Very disappointed😫
customer_reviews.author: Lui

customer_reviews.title: Broke, Amazon replaced, now Easy to use and tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Overall we really like it! Espresso tastes great. We are using Lavazzo espresso with Recaps stainless steel reusable pods and works well. After about 2 months with the item the water stopped coming out. Item does have amazon tech support, which they were unable to fix due to complexity over the phone. They tried to get the seller on the line but no contact was made. Although we were outside of the return window, Amazon shipped us a new machine, next day delivery and we were allowed to send back the broken item. The new one has worked perfectly! Easy to use and clean. Would buy again, and thanks to Amazons amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.author: LizaMay98

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made - did not make a good Espresso
customer_reviews.text: The unit did not produce espresso the way other Nespresso coffe emakers do. I think it was due to it not having a good temperature control on the brewing process.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernCA

customer_reviews.title: Good customer support
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great price for this Nespresso machine. It is compact and attractive, taking up little counter space. Good customer support. Cons: Although this product was securely packed, the water pump had somehow become disconnected. When we emailed customer support, they sent a link to a video with instructions to resolve the problem. I would give it more stars if we didn't have to take a new machine apart upon arrival and reconnect the water pump, and if a sample pack of coffee pods had been included with shipment. However, there was an offer for a Coffee Sampler included in the shipment when leaving a product review.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Machine looks different and came defective
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with a broken water tank lid right out of the box. The rigid plastic that holds the lid on was snapped off in the machine. Maybe this is why the machine never heated up and the brew selector (mine has in the back of machine) never stopped blinking. I thought I was getting the model shown by other reviewers as late as April 2019. I received the white one pictured now, but my return has a picture of the other machine with brew size selector in front. Either way, I returned the defective one to Amazon and ordered another one today. I will update how this one is when it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: OK starter model
customer_reviews.text: The price is ok as an entry model but I got a Breville on sale with a frother for $15 more. You're better off waiting for such a deal, which regularly happens around Mother's and Father's Days and again around Christmas. The brand name models are smaller and quieter than the Mueller.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wurtzel

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: Complete garbage. After running it through a few cycles to set the cup size, the machine started smoking and had a terrible burning plastic smell. I immediately unplugged it and requested a replacement never even getting a chance to brew any espresso. Got the replacement delivered promptly and it proceeded to leak all over the place from the base. I made sure it was seated properly but it continued to leak everywhere. 0 for 2. Guess that’s why it’s quite a bit cheaper than others.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas C.

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love Love...
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic machine. This is comparable to the high end machines. Just fill up the reservoir, put in the capsule, push either small (single) or large (double shot) and you have your espresso in less than 15 seconds. It does make a little noise but nothing like other machines. 20 bar High Pressure is perfect for home machine. We use ours to recreate Ice coffee you ca get at expensive coffee shops, saving hundreds of dollars. WELL worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Very good machine
customer_reviews.text: We'd had this machine for a few months and couldn't be happier. For the price we find it makes a very good espresso and the machine is solid; it doesn't have a cheap, light, plastic feel like a Keurig. It's easy to clean and the water chamber size is big enough for about 10 long shots. We have not experienced any leaks or anything, it just runs. Highly recommend this option if you are looking for a Nespresso machine.
customer_reviews.author: D2da

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: The Mueller Espresso Machine looks great and works very well. I already had a Nespresso machine at home and have ordered the Mueller for my office. I’ve used it now daily for a couple of month. I’m very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dalibor Jurcevic

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! - NOT WORTH IT (after nine months)
customer_reviews.text: Edit: After nine months of use this unit started leaking and stopped heating. Junked. And can't seem to find any warranty submission info here. I've never written a review update until today. Really disappointed. I'm too frugal to buy a Nespresso machine and figured that there HAD to be a more budget-conscious option. There IS! This Mueller Espresso machine is a VERY close second. (My fiancee has a $200+ "budget" Nespresso machine, so I can compare from experience). I'd easily buy this for 1/4 the price! No brainer! And makes a darn fine cup of espresso to boot!
customer_reviews.author: randy jordan

customer_reviews.title: Low price but watery espressos with little crema
customer_reviews.text: The good: price and build quality The bad: I tried 5 different nespresso pods: Peet’s, Lavazza, Pellini, Archer (Target), Starbucks, and original Nespresso. In all cases there was very little crema and the liquid tasted like coffee, not rich like an espresso. I noticed the penetration of the capsules is deeper and water runs faster, which would explain the weak consistency, and a consequent lack of pressure would explain the lack of crema. I’ll probably keep it as a backup, but I would not recommend buying this when for $40 more you can get a Nespresso Essenza.
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso dG

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disposable - Does not last...
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this machine if you plan to make more than one espresso per day. First one leaked at the pod. Second one's heating element failed. The company replaced them both times with new ones. This is what appears to be a nicely made machine at quite a reasonable price. But, even when it works, the pod connection leaks and makes a mess. I finally purchased a much better machine (Lelit) and am quite happy with it. Coffee ends up being much cheaper than pods. Again, I praise the company for staying behind their product. It probably wouldn't take many changes to make this machine a pure gem, but currently, it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel

customer_reviews.title: Truly Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best nespresso style machine out there! Less expensive than standard nespresso machines and surely built better! The 20 bar pump is superb and creates a rich crema (something you don’t normally get with these types of machines). Better yet, I had a small issue with the first machine I received (there was a scratch in the plastic). After being on the phone with customer service for only 3-4 minutes they shipped me a brand new machine...no returns, no nonsense! Their customer service is second to none! Would purchase their products again and again!
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: BEST Nespresso Machine!
customer_reviews.text: This Mueller machine that uses Nespresso Original Line capsules is awsome! Is it a little loud? Yes, but not that much louder than the Nespresso Inissia by De'Longhi that we have in the office. Don't go looking for aIl the bells & whistles, but if you are looking for an inexpensive way to get that delicious Nespresso fix, this is the machine for you! It has a cool design and doesn't take up too much room on your countertop. Stop wasting time...just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Valle

customer_reviews.title: Good price, fast warm-up, great pressure, tiny footprint
customer_reviews.text: Our DeLonghi Magnifica XS occupies pride of place and has served us well churning out the whole family of cappuccino, espresso, latte, macchiato, americano options for family and guests. We fill the hopper with our favorite beans and experiment with others sometimes, but it’s just not practical to change to decaf beans on demand... Too late in the day for the caffeine jolt has become earlier and earlier for me. This mighty little Mueller stands proudly next to my DeLonghi, and offers me the decaf option nearly instantly. Wish it came in colors!
customer_reviews.author: Lamama

customer_reviews.title: I wish this worked!!
customer_reviews.text: If this machine worked as well as the customer service, it would be a fantastic product!! I was so excited to receive this for Christmas! The first one we got did not work at all. Was quickly replaced by a second- great customer service. That one turned on but never pulled the water through. Both duds. We were quickly refunded. Not worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: hj

customer_reviews.title: If you’re on the fence, go for it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little machine to make a good cup of espresso. I’ve had my eye on it for a while and think i made the right choice getting this instead of a brand name nespresso one. Makes delicious smelling and tasting espresso and I’m excited to learn how to use it more. Hoping to use this to save at the coffee shop a little bit, although the pods can be pricey - i ordered mine in a pack of 50 for $35 which beats Starbucks! It is loud, but after watching videos of nespresso they seem just about as loud. It’s fast, energy friendly and the pods are recycleable. I’d buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: THE MCELROYS

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful machine with great design and straightforward functionality
customer_reviews.text: Smaller pods proved difficult to find, but machine is high quality. I've enjoyed the machine after finally finding the smaller vertuoline pods which proved difficult initially. The durability of the main body is very high, but the smaller components for the stage where the cup sits don't feel quite as premium Enjoyable product overall. (planned update after sampling more pods)
customer_reviews.author: samuel reed

customer_reviews.title: Great espresso maker
customer_reviews.text: I use this machine every morning to make espresso for my latte, and it's a dream. Heats up quickly and love that it has the long and short shot options. Only complaint is that sometimes the shot comes out a bit watery (I can see the shot being pulled and it'll look clear for a sec, even though I just put a new pod in there). I think this might happen because I'm pulling three shots. However, it's really consistent in delivering hot espresso shots and I'm really happy with the purchase. High quality and definitely recommend versus spending hundreds of dollars on another machine that does the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I think this thing works great. We had a Nespresso machine at work and I wanted to try this at home so I bought this version. It produces great crema and works like a champ. Heats up quick on start-up. I don't know why you'd pay the premium for a name brand. The only thing I would like to see improved is if they put the power button on top or in front. It's on the side and unfortunately for my setup that's the side closest to the wall so I have to reach in sight unseen to turn it on everytime, but that's minor. Still five stars.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Worked well, until it didn’t. Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Loved this for the 6-7 months it worked - it was small and easy to use and clean. However, it eventually started spitting out water everywhere. A couple descaling cycles didn’t help. Eventually diagnosed the issue as a torn/disconnected hose, but even after reconnecting, something was wrong. Worked well for just long enough to get past the return window. That seems to be the new norm for most stuff Great customer Service by Mueller though. I contacted them with the problem and they issued a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Ami C

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: For a sub $100 nespresso maker, this is a ridiculous value. It is built like a tank and feels like a $300 machine. I am beyond happy at this machine with a 2 year warranty. Its a bit noisy, but most of these machines have a bit of noise while brewing. Would I buy this again, heck yeah !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Three weeks ago, I would have given this five stars. Now, it doesn’t fully punch each capsule, it crinkles some, and I’m wasting about 50% of my capsules. So disappointing because it was so wonderful before!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine!
customer_reviews.text: After several days of looking through reviews of multiple machines this is the one I settled on. I have had this great little guy for 6 months now and its used multiple times a day in our caffeine fueled household, it stills works juts as great as day one. The was only machine I found that used enough pressure to make a true espresso that wasn't 3 million dollars. We have used multiple different brands of the pods and have had no issue with any of them. If you are looking for something that won't take a lot of counter space, makes great espresso with the correct pressure and looks nice than this is the beauty for you.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Love the style but it is very noisy
customer_reviews.text: This coffee machine is pretty stylish, but the main complaint will be it is very noisy. The moment when machine grabs a capsule inside and pierce it to brew a cup is very noisy, it almost feels like a small car overpowered by a big motor.... The good side is a temperature of the coffee, if you like it hot then this one is for you. In my case, temperature is important and I like that it delivers. The flavors of the capsules are OK not great though. If you are looking for a coffee machine on a budget and not so picky on coffee flavors then this machine will make you happy
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Z

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Had to return a defective machine. The replacement arrived very quickly. Great espresso machine. Peet’s and gimoka are great off-brand pods to use in this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Frampton

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, but avoid cheap coffee pods
customer_reviews.text: This machine works great and compares with far more expensive brands. However, I don’t recommend going with the cheap offbrand pods, which will destroy your pump, give you watery coffee and cause excessive leaking. I’m sorry to say, but stick with the more expensive true nespresso brand coffee pods, much more consistent result and fat better tasting. Your machine will also last a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: bingo

customer_reviews.title: Very delicious and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Have to say that this is the easiest and the simplest way to make my Americano every day. The espresso tastes very very good. This Mueller machine is very durable and heavier than I expected. The noise it makes is a little loud during brewing but it is only for a very short period of time. Thank you for providing me with a cup of great Americano every morning. Definitely more economical!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: When we needed to replace our old espresso machine, after much looking, we decided to go with this one. We have used it about five times and so far so good. We really like its compact size and the fact that it is really easy to clean. When done using it you can pull out the plastic parts, where the espresso pods drop, and rinse it all off quickly. No mess and it makes a pretty good espresso. We also like the feature that allows you to use an espresso size cup or a coffee mug. Our old machine only allowed the placement of an espresso size cup under the spout. You can't beat the price for the product.
customer_reviews.author: JChr

customer_reviews.title: leaking after 8 months,,,
customer_reviews.text: First, this unit has begun leaking after just 8 months of less than daily use! I use a DeLonghi Inissia at work, which is does a great job as a basic machine. This was on special, so I bought it....and it does not have even the basic functions the DeLonghi such as being able to push the 'size' button while it's warming up so it then starts to make your cup right away, instead of having to stand there and wait for it to warm up. Also, you cannot tailor your cup size, or re-set it to "Factory Settings" either. Also, it seems to make a weaker cup using the exact same pods as the other machine.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I’d bought a Keureg or actual Nespresso (and will probably end up with one). This thing is crap. It ruins about 50% of the pods I put in it, rendering them useless. Will be returning this awful machine.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Pingel

customer_reviews.title: Everything Works Beautifully
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, the Mueller Espresso Machine (MEM) was exactly what I was expecting. It looks great, small footprint, lightweight and easy to use. Some of the negative reviews before I ordered regarding leaking was put to rest as the MEM works beautifully and no leaks whatsoever. Some complained about the noise - they obviously don't own an espresso machine. I have a Gaggia and a Breville Oracle Touch- both are much noisier- but music to my espresso loving ears. I only used the MEM for a week thus far, but couldn't be happier with its ease of use and great result of each shot. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Chu

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this expresso machine for my son for Christmas as he uses one at his office. We were very disappointed! The machine turned on and heated up but we could not get it to work. We got our refund right away and have sent it back. We will try one more time as he loves the same one at his office. Hopefully we will have better luck!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Three strikes
customer_reviews.text: Bought one and was initially pleased. Bought another for my daughter. Shortly afterwards, mine stopped working. The seller replaced it for free. Very quickly, so I was happy with that. After a few months neither my daughter’s machine nor mine would brew hot coffee. We had to microwave it to get it up to drinking temperature. Rather than gambling that a fourth machine would work, I got rid of all the Muellers and went with real Nespresso machines.
customer_reviews.author: Max Fracas

customer_reviews.title: A small compact way to get Espresso
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine. Having a small kitchen it's prefect and it also makes a great cup of Espresso. You might want to dd in an order for what ever brand of capsules you will want to use. It didn't come with samples but it does come with gifting you a sample box when you give a product review. I normally do on anything I buy but if you don't....do it for this. Very happy all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Dale

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: If I could give 0 stars I would. The first product I ordered, pulled out of box plugged it in and it never worked. Reordered, Second one. EXACT SAME THING. Even the representative told me getting two defective items was a 1 in a million chance but I decided to order a different coffee machine. Too bad. I really wanted this one.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.  Good customer support, too.
customer_reviews.text: Based on great reviews on Amazon, I ordered the Mueller Nespresso machine and it arrived today. I was pretty excited, but after following the instructions the unit powered up, lighted that it was ready to brew, and then nothing happened. Nothing. I emailed Mueller customer support and within a half an hour had a fix to the problem, which involved a bit of dismantling of the machine. An internal wire had come loose from the pump, and after I clicked it back in place the unit works fine. I'll followup later about the longevity and production of the unit, but my first espresso was very, very good.
customer_reviews.author: David Zemens

customer_reviews.title: Very poor, fails quickly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this machine for travel After a few cups, it stopped actually brewing coffee. Instead it just poured hot water into the cup wasting expensive capsules. After several attempts to get the machine to make coffee consistently, I gave up and threw the machine away. I strongly suggest you avoid the the Mueller Espresso Machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LORD JESUS THERES A FIRE
customer_reviews.text: Even though it’s brew water amount was never exact, I still loved it. Until it came time to clean the machine with recommend clean application and directions. Smoke fire disconnect product, go the fire down to where I could carry it outside and hose it down. Shameful. This was the model that preceded the one in the above picture. Now I see why they returned to the previous model. Müller why have you not issued a recall??
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan P Mugridge

customer_reviews.title: Two separate machine both died after a couple of days.
customer_reviews.text: Update: 2nd machine did the same thing after about 25 shots. Dumps water on the countertop. Day1: Worked great right out of the box. For $75 you can't go wrong. Perfect for those that don't want a full blown espresso machine or prefer the convenience of pods. Day 3: After ten shots pulled and the machine started dumping water all over the counter top. Shortly thereafter it completely died, would not power up. Read the 1 star reviews. Leaking water is a common problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rfojr

customer_reviews.title: Quite easy for a novice !
customer_reviews.text: Just bought the Mueller Espresso machine, on the 2nd cup, we got a perfect homemade espresso. Who would have thought it ! There is a little bit of a learning curve measuring, packing and sealing the re-usable pods. Very excited about making our own homemade espresso! The quality of this machine looks to be quite high. the small footprint is nice too. Very simple to use. I would highly recommend this espresso machine !
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Would make a great gift for an ex-wife, mother-in-law or ex-girlfriend
customer_reviews.text: Blending feature is inconsistent. Some Nespresso pods don't get fully punctured which yields a cup of brown tinged warm water. This is very wasteful considering the price of good quality pods. Spend a little more and get another brand's machine. Constantly undergoing trouble shooting procedures with no improvement, and have given up on it. Pay an extra $50 and get a Nespresso brand. The extra $ is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Eaton Drinkwell

customer_reviews.title: short lived coffee - 6 weeks of joy, then it  exploded the capsules! But then a miracle happened!!
customer_reviews.text: It worked great until it stopped working completely 6 weeks later. But help came immediately! The Connected Home - a private business that sold the Mueller - saw my negative comments here and contacted me and is sending a replacement for what must have been defective unit! So I will stick with my original comment: this is a quiet, efficient (Austrian designed and made, no wonder!) machine that never leaks (the way the Nespresso) does and heats up quickly and always makes espresso with a lovely layer of "coffee foam" on top.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Hotchner

customer_reviews.title: Yep. There it is!
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is so great! Truly little in size which makes it less bothersome to have out on the counter as does the nice design. The espresso couldn’t be better! We are so happy with the amount of crema and quality of shot it puts out. I did tons of research before purchasing this for my husband and was a little nervous to not get an official nespresso machine but I’m so glad I opted for this! 100% would recommend. This machine is noisy but only due to the fact that it’s a high pressure machine that creates actual espresso shots.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect espresso, amazing price
customer_reviews.text: OK, so it is designed in Austria and made in China, but they call it Italian? Not sure I understand that. But it makes a great cup of espresso. Quick and a nice crema. Small unit and as quiet as they come, which you will understand if you've ever used another. I bought the extended warrant for a few bucks, just in case, but so far, so good. Even works with the plastic fillable pods.
customer_reviews.author: BLD

customer_reviews.title: Great espresso at home!
customer_reviews.text: This is a super simple espresso machine to use. Put pod and water in and push button and espresso in a cup. I would have liked to received a few sample pods in order to try it immediately. I had to go to 3 different stores to find d the right style and they were not on the cheaper side of coffee. If they were to also add a reusable pod this would be absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: NMom5

customer_reviews.title: Great espresso
customer_reviews.text: Love the machine, it makes great espresso. The water heats up really hot and quickly I feel like I am in Italy for a few minutes each day I drink it. A lot cheaper than Nespresso, plus this is a solid machine.
customer_reviews.author: Laila Petruzziello

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes for this relatively inexpensive machine based on reviews, and, boy, what a disappointment. I’ve used it together with actual nspresso pods and with reusable pods using my own coffee (that I brew normally in a Turkish press machine) and every time it came out very weak, barely tasting as coffee. I used it on a long function and even tried to run through the same pod twice in one cup... still the same result: barely drinkable liquid that I cannot call coffee. It’s on my return list.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: One out of three pods misfires
customer_reviews.text: Like the headline says, approximately one out of three pods doesn't work right through this machine. I'm using official nestle pods. When it malfunctions it seems like it's not piercing the pod right. WHat comes out is mostly hot water with maybe a tiny bit of color. Since the pods are $0.70 each at best I hate the fact that I'm wasting every third one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks from the bottom after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: This was working wonderful! We loved it so much, right from the start, that we bought a second one right away for our RV. Well 8 months later and it is leaking terrible from the bottom every single time we brew a cup. It goes all over our counter, down the cabinets and on to the floor. I would save save the money and just splurge up front to get the Nespresso. I’ll be reaching out to the company to see if there’s anything they’re able to do. And if so, I’ll update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Coffee machine malfunctioned, but seller sent me a replacement one right away , free of charge.
customer_reviews.text: Trick: press button until you hear the capsule getting punctured (PSSHH sound) then press again to stop. Wait a few seconds. Then press the lungo (long) button. You'll notice the stream slows considerable down because you have presoaked the ground in the capsule. The water pressure will push out more crema. Big difference. Reason to Press lungo (long coffee) instead of corto (short coffee) is because water pump is set to run for set seconds , and if you do the pre-soaking trick, less coffee stream will come out, so you need to run it longer to get the same amount of Coffey you would have gotten of you simply pressed the button.
customer_reviews.author: Dario

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to clean, and fast
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several espresso makers at various price levels, and this one is the best I've owned for the money. It takes less than a minute to heat up and brews a cup in about 20 seconds. I've been using reusable pods, so I'm still experimenting with grinding and tamping, but I've already enjoyed several good cups of espresso with this maker. Most of the parts are removable for easy cleanup. It is noisy when it brews, but I don't mind. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes just right!
customer_reviews.text: My partner and I had recently returned from Europe and were disappointed at every espresso we had ordered since returning to the US. But this machine saved us! It makes a delicious cup and is so easy to set up, clean and maintain. Tastes just right and am relieved we found this machine for such a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Brothers

customer_reviews.title: Coffee does not brew properly
customer_reviews.text: The machine came with a broken lid to the water tank. I called the company and they sent a new tank and lid right away so I would give them a 5 star on customer service. The machine would get a 1 star rating. Sometimes the pods didn't punch completely or they did not punch at all. Coffee would come out weak and sometimes just clear water because of the failure to puncture the pod. It was also inconsistent as far as volume of coffee produced. I returned the machine and will go back to a Nespresso brand.
customer_reviews.author: Debra J Benbow

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: did not do anyting after repeded buton presses....then it started smoking and it mealted the coffee pod....
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work!
customer_reviews.text: I got it today, and it's not working!! It's very loud and noisy.
customer_reviews.author: aya

customer_reviews.title: Not A Good Machine, Good Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Wanted good, less expensive, Nespresso original machine. First machine worked for a few months then would only put out hot water. Tried all the online fixes but no-go. Was happily replaced by customer service. A few months later same thing, only hot water 1/2 the time. Returned for a refund because they no longer sell this unit, likely because it didn't work well or last more than few months. Never did work with off-brand pods as noted in another review. Not so good Nespresso maker, buy something else. A+ for Mueller customer service
customer_reviews.author: GRAYTech

customer_reviews.title: IMPRESSED!
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for an easy to use espresso machine to replace the non-pod version I already had. I really wasn't into spending that much for a name brand machine, and then I found this one! I trusted the countless high reviews and pulled the trigger and WOW, I must say that I am impressed. This little machine is adorable and works very well! It is compact, heats up quickly after being off, and produces really great quality espresso. Cleaning is easy, and I love the fact that you can use Nespresso pods. Definitely a must buy if you are in the market from something small, easy to use, at an excellent price point!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine is exactly what I was looking for in my office. Our local coffee shop recently closed and we didn't like the espresso at any of the other shops, so we needed a simple alternative. This Mueller fit the bill exactly. We weren't looking for a lot of features. Just a simply quality machine that is easy to use. So far so good. Not really a gripe, but if I had to say anything it would be nice to have an adjustment for temperature control, but other than that I'm very happy with the purchase. Can't comment on durability at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W.

customer_reviews.title: Alternative to Starbucks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product along with the following milk frother from Sayeso Direct:  This is an excellent alternative to driving to Starbucks, and this expresso machine is high quality. No issue as of today, and I also like the 2 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Great for a reliable, satisfying cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little machine! Does it produce first class, absolutely amazing espresso? Well, no. You would need a more powerful machine. Is it great for the budget, space, and ease of use conscious? Yes! I have this at my place of work to have as an afternoon pick me up. I have used a Keurig before purchasing this machine, and I wasn't a fan. The Keurig pods tasted stale and made a weak cup of coffee. I am a latte lover and knew I wanted to step up my afternoon coffee game. Glad I did! It's compact, extremely easy to use, and gives me consistent coffee. It was just what I was looking for at an amazing price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noisy espresso machine
customer_reviews.text: This espresso machine is small for tide spaces; however, it makes a loud noise when brewing. The water leaks with coffee grinds to cup.
customer_reviews.author: Puchukina

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much what I expected from the other reviews!
customer_reviews.text: One thing I want to recommend though - you have to run some water through the machine before your first use. It is a bit loud like everyone else has said, so I recommend trying it out and doing the water run the day before you need it. I was worried the noise would wake up my roommates because it had to run for so long that first time. For every other day though, the noise really only happens for about a minute so it's not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Paulina Romero

customer_reviews.title: Good product with great support!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product many, many times since purchasing it in April 2019 without issue. However, one day recently the clear plastic water reservoir seemed to crack for no real reason. However, I emailed Mueller support and they sent me a new water reservoir replacement no questions asked. Can't ask for better support than that!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Groux

customer_reviews.title: Better than namebrand!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Nespresso Issina two years ago and it completely stopped working. I went through the trouble shooting and warranty steps and nothing could fix it. Nespresso would not do anything to help. This works better than that nespresso ever did and it was cheaper! Don’t waste your money on something more expensive when you can get this!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great espresso machine ...two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine three days now and love it! I think i'm drinking way too much espresso but it works and looks great on my counter. Water heat up time is fast and the pressure is amazing with no clean up. With Christmas approaching this will make a great gift for family or friends.
customer_reviews.author: Rogue

customer_reviews.title: Great Nespresso compatible coffee machine
customer_reviews.text: I like the Nespresso coffee system but not the high price of a branded machine. Alway a sceptic about compatible machines I was completely blown away with the build quality and looks of the Mueller espresso machine. The he coffee tastes outstanding, it takes only a short time to heat up and the genuine Nespresso coffee capsules fit perfectly. Great value and looks good on my kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: lucandog

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I have very little patience so if you send me something that racks up 4 strikes in under 15 minutes, you're getting it right back. First, the machine I received was not silver. It was stark white. Secondly, it came to me with the lid already cracked. Third, it didn't work - right out of the box. Could never get a solid white light. And fourth, the directions are written in such broken English I could barely get through them. Guarantee the product literature has never been proofed by a proficient English speaker. I had this in my home for less than 12 hours. It went right back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Born2Rezist

customer_reviews.title: Love this Expresso Machine
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use, very good as far as space saving on my counter next to my coffee maker. Quick shipping & nice quality! Love using the Nespresso capsules - they have great taste over Starbucks (my former favorite coffee/expresso brand. Nespresso is true Italian taste & blends - tastes just like the expressos I have had in Italy! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Shoshaunna

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this back a couple month size ago but did not open because of the move. finally decided to use this yesterday only to find out that it is defective. Very disappointed And it’s too late to return to get another one
customer_reviews.author: Joy Mcknight

customer_reviews.title: If you like your Espresso Machine delivered in pieces, look no further...
customer_reviews.text: I never got to try it...WARNING! Flimsy packaging. No protection from dents or the elements. A sheath of cardboard with zero protective packaging. It was as if you purchased it off the shelf from Target and tried to mail it via carrier pigeon across the country with scotch tape and a forever stamp. The manufacturer might have a good product but you would never know or experience it since they don’t put any logical thought into the actual packaging to protect their product...seems very counterproductive to me and a waste of my time to repackage and return it. 😳
customer_reviews.author: Greta

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Dead right out of the box. The process to fix the machine requires that you dismantle it entirely. I’m not dismantling a brand new machine. Incredibly disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for your money
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this machine and I also have a Delonghi one (a lot more expensive). I can say that the Mueler gives me the same quality coffee (very good) that I get from the more expensive one. Also, I had a minor problem with the machine, called tech support and they fixed it very quickly. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Small Espresso Machine - Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This espresso machine performs beautifully. There was an issue with the first machine not working properly, but when I called customer service - the issue was handled professionally and immediately buy sending me out a new machine. I can't say enough about how pleased I am with the performance - hot tasteful espresso without the fuss, nothing can be better. The size of the machine is perfect as it takes up less space than my toaster! Granted, it is a little noisy, but have you ever heard a full-sized espresso machine -- they are anything but quiet! You won't be disappointed with this machine. As a special shout out to Paul Brown in customer service -- job well done!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine,  want one for work.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The espresso is a wonderful rusty brown and plenty of creama on top. It is a small footprint with a lot more counter space! Since being a Peet's Coffee fan, love my Peet's pods. My wife is enjoying her lattes as well. I highly recommend this little machine, easy to use and the right price, wonder if my wife will let me get one for work.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Works good but make sure to run the machine before using.
customer_reviews.text: The expresso taste is good and the small footprint it has is perfect for those trying to conserve space. Just make sure to run the machine more than the once it states because there is a strong plastic smell and nasty water that comes out of it. Other than that no issues and its a great little machine.
customer_reviews.author: Heyheyhey

customer_reviews.title: Overall, good purchase
customer_reviews.text: The first one we ordered came dead on arrival. Amazon refunded quickly and we were able to order a second machine that came working perfectly. It's a nice easy machine to set up, clean and use and the espresso comes out nicely. Only downside is it is very loud when its brewing (not a huge deal because it only makes the noise for 30 seconds).
customer_reviews.author: Ryan lam

customer_reviews.title: Fast perfect espresso
customer_reviews.text: This espresso machine heats up considerably faster than my former Francis illy espresso machine. The machine is ready in about 20 seconds compared to 2-3 minutes. It uses the widely available nespresso capsules. Excellent customer service when I had trouble reprogramming the dispensing time interval.
customer_reviews.author: AFrisby

customer_reviews.title: Two machines failed
customer_reviews.text: Both machines failed to load water from the tank after unboxing. I have owned 3 Nespresso machines in the past and this machine, both of them that were sent on Amazon Prime have been junk. I can't recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: gerbilminded

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE TIME ORDERING THIS
customer_reviews.text: Unit turns on but nothing happens, no drip. Called customer service and said that the water pump may have lost contact and sent us video instrucrions on how ro fix. The problem is, we had to open the machine and there were ALOT of screws to dismantle! So i processed the return and ordered another one. I requested to make sure the 2nd machine will work. To our surprise, its the same thing! Its not working! We are moving on toanother brand.
customer_reviews.author: Nessin D.

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a single serve espresso maker for quite awhile now, and I splurged after the holidays on this one. I compared the Mueller with several other Nespresso branded units as well as some others by DeLonghi and Breville - but also didn't want to spend $200+ on a similar machine. I've now used the Mueller several times and its amazing, great quality, seems to be well built and I got for under $100. I think you'll be happy in particular by not having to spend so much on other comparable machines.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Steading

customer_reviews.title: Strongly recommended, no regrets!
customer_reviews.text: Really glad I chose Mëuller! I made my first Americano and as you can see in the photo, it’s awesome. Compact espresso maker doesn’t take up much room on my counter which is plus. Very easy to use not complicated. Looking forward to making more espresso’s, had fun making the first one. I totally recommend this espresso maker!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works with Nespresso
customer_reviews.text: The machine works great, is easy to use, lightweight, portable. It does indeed work with Nespresso capsules. The only difference I’ve noticed from using my original Nespresso machine is the coffee doesn’t quite come out as frothy. I used to think that was the Nespresso ingredients themselves but I think it must be a machine capability.
customer_reviews.author: jill seidner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I love my Mueller Espresso maker. It makes delicious hot espresso with crema, very easy to use, and takes up very little space on my counter. Customer service is excellent with friendly Staff and eficient service. I Have a Jura, about a $2,300 machine which I love too. If Jura and Kurig had a baby it would be the Mueller! A very good machine, and a very good price. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra M.

customer_reviews.title: Very noisy
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent Nespresso Originaline machine for the money. Heats fast, good consistent pour. My one gripe is the machine is VERY noisy and vibrates a lot. But for the price, it can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: It is good!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the office,it has to be small,easy to operate and easy to clean.Great on all those.The coffee was amazing.I began to use it at my house since it have to be prepared and loved it so much that I'm going to buy one for the house.Just love it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: coco lopez

product_meta.title: Mueller Espresso Machine for Nespresso Compatible Capsule, Premium Italian 20 Bar High Pressure Pump, 25s Fast Heating with Energy Saving System, Programmable Buttons for Espresso and Lungo, 1400W
product_meta.description: With the Mueller Espresso Machine you can make coffee at anytime without having to go out to get your favorite blends. With a tiny footprint, compact and lightweight, Mueller Espresso Machine is a smart coffee machine to make your life easier. One-touch operation and patented extraction system which delivers up to 20 bar pressure. Create a quick, delicious coffee. The water tank holds up to 24 oz. so you need not refilling. A fast-heat up time means the water reaches the ideal temperature in 60 seconds. An energy saving mode that automatically switches the machine off after 10 minutes. Note: 1. This coffee machine was special designed for the Nespresso capsules. 2. Mug and coffee capsules are not included in package.
feature_bullets: ☕ PREMIUM ITALIAN HIGH PRESSURE PUMP – Delivers up to 20 bar pressure which like premium professional machines allows for a barista-style result, unlocking the delicate flavor and premium aromas of each coffee capsule during the brewing process and creating an incomparably dense and unctuous crema.

☕ ULTRA FAST HEAT-UP SYSTEM - Mueller Espresso Machine only needs about 25 seconds to preheat, then you can get coffee immediately without preheating and within 10 minutes the energy-saving mode will switch off the machine automatically saving you electricity.
☕ EASY OPERATION - The one-touch buttons with two cup capacities Short and Long (Espresso and Lungo) can be reprogrammed to custom volumes and are backlit for ease of use.
☕ LARGE CAPACITY SMALL FOOTPRINT – With a small footprint taking up minimal counter space but a large water tank which is detachable, easy to clean and dishwasher safe, holds 27 fl oz/0.8 L water.
☕ EUROPEAN QUALITY – AMERICAN GUARANTEE - 100% 2 year warranty, 120V, 60Hz, 27 FL OZ/0.8L, 1400W, ETL approved product, Designed for use with Nespresso capsules.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars1,610 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
